html:
4.23.19  8:19 pm   Why is everyone so cute except for me?

     that's what cute means. it means 'someone else'

4.23.19  8:15 pm   Do you like to pretend?

     only for business

4.23.19  7:47 pm   how do you tell the people around you that you completely failed at a major task in your life when you didn't tell them you were even struggling

     maybe you don't have to tell them at all. but if you do, then you can explain that the reason you didn't tell them anything before was because you really didn't want them to be unhappy with you. almost everyone has been in this situaion before in some way, so i'm sure they will be able to relate to this

4.23.19  6:49 pm   What do you want to get done before you make the bill wurtz band a thing? What do think it will take for you to decide "yes i'm ready now let's do this"? 

     if i had some world wide hit music, that would make it seem like more of a priority, and worth pausing the production of new music. but even so i can't imagine ever being comfortable pausing the production of new music

4.23.19  6:28 pm   Why have you not been posting on instagram or YouTube? (Hope this doesn't bother you)

     because the video i am making is still in the audio stages (not done, and therefore should not be posted to youtube yet) and my instagram account is mostly artifacts and reveals based on the upcoming video, which usually come from the visual portion of the process

4.23.19  6:15 pm   opinion on wikipedia?

     it reminds me of the world's oceans

4.23.19  6:09 pm   how soon is your next video coming out?

     not as soon as i would prefer

4.23.19  5:48 pm   how do you think people should reply to your tweets

     personally i prefer not to use the @ sign on twitter. it just feels cumbersome and cluttered. so i have no advice for how to use it well. that being said i have many friends who are distinguished @ sign users and i have nothing but the utmost respect for @ signs and the dignified professionals who use them

4.23.19  5:38 pm   can you play the mandolin?

     i never have but i think i could

4.23.19  4:58 pm   what was the purpose of "darkness video"?

     i believe every artist should try a nothing piece at least once, just to get it out of your system

4.23.19  4:05 pm   do you plan on invading russia

     not necessary, the damn thing invades itself

4.23.19  4:04 pm   Can you write an opera for my dumb music class? Thx

     it would probably be some kind of escape song

4.23.19  3:21 pm   How do you deal with procrastination?

     first you must never say 'procrastination'. that is a terriblly long word and it can waste very much time to say it

4.23.19  2:34 pm   Relistening to "might quit," did you actually decide to quit on the very first day of college/university or was it more over time before the realization hit?

     that's just a song, not a biography. but hopefully contains elements about how maybe i or others have felt before, in various ways

4.23.19  2:15 pm   4.22.19  12:35 pm Yeah, that's what I said. You aren't adding more dates

     yes i am. you said am i changing them. no i am not changing them. i am keeping the ones that are already there the same. and i am adding more videos at other dates, and keeping those the same as themselves also. actually not only am i adding videos and dates, but recently i covertly added multiple dates to all existing videos, to indicate more specifically when it was edited and posted, which is almost always a vastly different date from when the original content was recorded, due to the way the project works

4.23.19  12:58 pm   have you ever struggled with peoples perception of you and did you find any tips or trix for that ?

     flip it around, perceive them back. give them a taste of their own medicine

4.23.19  12:52 pm   I my college, the management sucks

     this is part of your education in how not to manage a college

4.23.19  11:52 am   Why do you care about our stupid questions?

     due to their intelligence

4.23.19  11:52 am   How do you feel about math?

     it's like heroin when you get so addicted you're almost dead

4.23.19  10:35 am   I'm at the airport terminal. what should I do now

     try to detect what part of the world you are in

4.23.19  9:53 am   Did you ever feel that the world wasn't ready for your content? 

     the world is always right

4.23.19  9:38 am   Would you make a video about trains? 

     i will try

4.23.19  9:38 am   Does nonsensical crap make you cool?

     no

4.23.19  8:49 am   4.22.19  6:42 am what about that one time you returned an F. Scott Fitzgerald book, which while doing so happened to be when you wrote "murder your demon"?.....i need to get out more.

     i did not write 'murder your demon' then, i wrote 'dream of evil.' which was at a different library than where i returned the book. and i only used the drop slot from 1 library, and the tables in the other

4.23.19  8:22 am   do you ever plan to go on that interview show on youtube where you eat progressively spicier chicken until you nealry choke when answering the host (that's the gimmick)?

     if they could take away the chicken wings i would do it

4.23.19  7:22 am   do you feel understood by your fanbase?

     occasionally

4.23.19  6:44 am   why isn't there a magic 9-ball yet

     too magical. would never get past the regulations

4.23.19  5:50 am   Do you play the violin?

     no

4.23.19  4:31 am   could you suggest a good name for a dolphin?

     My Dolphin 2

4.23.19  2:20 am   Can we have one word from your new song lyrics?

     the

4.23.19  1:50 am   How do i leave my room

     the same way you got there, but in reverse

4.23.19  1:19 am   why did my cat just shit on the floor

     because it ate something earlier, also gravity played a role

4.23.19  1:04 am   do you have tips on quickly being able to identify notes right away after hearing them? because i want to write songs but i think it'd be very difficult doing that because i'd have to go and listen to every note and match up what i have in my mind to what the notes sound like since i can't remember specific notes wdqwdwqwdqwdwqd

     this should come naturally the more quality time you spend with the instrument

4.23.19  12:37 am   Do your videos that at first seem preety odd have actually a deep meaning? And if so, give me clues and I will investigate 

     you'll have to try them and see. it was made for you, not some alternate person in an alternate non-existant world full of chopped liver so to speak

4.23.19  12:25 am   when would it be, if you had the choice?

     now

4.22.19  11:30 pm   Is there any chance you could put "I like" on Spotify any time soon? 

     yes

4.22.19  10:50 pm   I have decided to compile a list of my very favorite 320 songs that all have something about them that I really want to learn.  I plan to learn as much of the list as I can in 3 months with a focus on performability (can I perform it for an audience comfortably?), assimilating elements (am i making any sense of what is going on?), and perhaps a little bit of content if I'm lucky.  I'm putting this deadline because this is a deadly serious thing that i've probably been needing to do for awhile but I have been swamped with trying to figure out how to make content. But i'm afraid if i don't do this my content and my position as a musician will not grow nearly at the exponential rate that it might if i just do this project and use the powers afterwards.  i just don't want to die taking forever to do it. Does this sound like a good plan to you?  Any tips, tricks, or advice?

     what i would suggest is use a random number selection to determine which one you do next, and just start selecting ones and doing them. you can keep doing this for several days, but it is not necessary to do the entire list before doing anything else. you can continue to do this regularly while also working on other things

4.22.19  10:47 pm   Do you have any tips for doing oral presentations in front of people?

     you will get better at it the more times you do it. no tips for the first time, just enjoy how ridiculous it feels

4.22.19  10:23 pm   how to not be sad about everything one can be sad about?

     be happy about everything one can be happy about

4.22.19  9:30 pm   so when you sync to a fingersnap on video at the same time as a snare, do you line up the initial frame of the snare or the first loud frame? and then do you line up with the blurry frame of the snap being performed, or the first clear frame of the snap being completed?

     the first loud sounding frame and the first clear frame of the closed snap should be fine, then watch it and see if it feels right. but actually in most cases, if i am snapping to a snare drum, it probably means i was listening to a playback of the song while recording. so what i do when the video is imported is i synchronize the room audio to the track and then everything is automatically at the right time

4.22.19  9:05 pm   Would you make a video about trains

     sure

4.22.19  7:22 pm   do you still use the camera mentioned in that one reality vid?

     no

      if so when do you use it and for what

4.22.19  6:41 pm   im sad, what happened to every other tuesday?

     i started attempting to do every tuesday which caused me to fail spectacularly at everything

      i really need more bill wurtz content

     me too

4.22.19  5:25 pm   4.18.19 4:00am
Fear of what exactly?

     anything you can imagine

4.22.19  5:23 pm   who says i can't be ten feet tall

     no one but why aren't you

4.22.19  4:58 pm   Can you teach me how to make toast?

     toast can only be made from 7 other pieces of toast, arranged in a sacred formation. the first piece of toast is believed to have been found high atop mount toast

4.22.19  4:56 pm   Do you find eating weird? You basically shove things in a hole in your face

     i see what you mean

4.22.19  4:16 pm   why don't you learn to play the otamatone

     never heard of it

4.22.19  4:06 pm   How does one find what they want to do in life?

     it will find you. if it's not, then go exploring in a carefree manner

4.22.19  3:56 pm   Easter is the first Sunday after the first full moon after the spring equinox, my man?

      the paschal full moon, and the ecclesiastical vernal equinox my man
